patthana8.51:1.1: Nasaṅkiliṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.51:2.1_0: Naasaṅkiliṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naasaṅkiliṭṭhaṁ
patthana8.51:2.1_1: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naasaṅkiliṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana8.51:2.1_2: paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭho ca naasaṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.51:3.1: Nasaṅkiliṭṭhañca naasaṅkiliṭṭhañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.51:4.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
